Silent Solar

Characters

  • Tom Kernan
  • Abby Geist
  • Doc Block

Scenes

Abby Geist was soaking some red kidney beans in the kitchen. Over her shoulder, she remarked to Tom, "Christianity, you know, is white supremacist."

"It is?"

"Of course: it has been instrumental in a system of white oppression and worldwide terrorism for 500 years."
